abstract: BERT-based NLW method. Besides, compared with previous state-of-the-art method Compared with other state-of-the-art baselines, the experimental results show that the proposed LS method improves the Precision@1 score from 51.7% to 58.3% and from 50.5% to 62.6% on LS07 and CoInCo benchmarks, respectively.
